    • MessageTransaction

      public MessageTransaction​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicId topicId)
      Creates a new instance of a message transaction.
      Parameters:
      topicId - Consensus topic ID to which message will be submitted.

    • MessageTransaction

      public MessageTransaction​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicId topicId, MessageEnvelope<T> message)
      Creates a new instance of a message transaction with already prepared message.
      Parameters:
      topicId - Consensus topic ID to which message will be submitted.
      message - The message signed and ready to be sent.

  • Method Details

    • buildMessage

      protected abstract MessageEnvelope<T> buildMessage()
      Method that constructs a message envelope with a message of type T.
      Returns:
      The message envelope with a message inside ready to sign.

    • provideMessageEncrypter

      protected abstract java.util.function.UnaryOperator<T> provideMessageEncrypter​(java.util.function.UnaryOperator<byte[]> encryptionFunction)
      Provides an instance of a message encrypter.
      Parameters:
      encryptionFunction - Encryption function used to encrypt single message property.
      Returns:
      The message encrypter instance.

    • provideTopicListener

      protected abstract MessageListener<T> provideTopicListener​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicId topicIdToListen)
      Provides a MessageListener instance specific to the submitted message type.
      Parameters:
      topicIdToListen - ID of the HCS topic.
      Returns:
      The topic listener for this message on a mirror node.

    • handleError

      protected void handleError​(java.lang.Throwable err)
      Handles the error. If external error handler is defined, passes the error there, otherwise raises RuntimeException.
      Parameters:
      err - The error.
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - Runtime exception with the given error in case external error handler is not defined.

    • onEncrypt

      public MessageTransaction<T> onEncrypt​(java.util.function.UnaryOperator<byte[]> encrypter)
      Defines encryption function that encrypts the message attributes before submission.
      Parameters:
      encrypter - The encrypter to use.
      Returns:
      This transaction instance.

    • onMessageConfirmed

      public MessageTransaction<T> onMessageConfirmed​(java.util.function.Consumer<MessageEnvelope<T>> receiver)
      Handles event from a mirror node when a message was consensus was reached and message received.
      Parameters:
      receiver - The receiver handling incoming message.
      Returns:
      This transaction instance.

    • onError

      public MessageTransaction<T> onError​(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> handler)
      Defines a handler for errors when they happen during execution.
      Parameters:
      handler - The error handler.
      Returns:
      This transaction instance.

    • onDecrypt

      public MessageTransaction<T> onDecrypt​(java8.util.function.BiFunction<byte[],​org.threeten.bp.Instant,​byte[]> decrypter)
      Defines decryption function that decrypts message attributes after consensus is reached. Decryption function must accept a byte array of encrypted message and an Instant that is its consensus timestamp,
      Parameters:
      decrypter - The decrypter to use.
      Returns:
      This transaction instance.

      Returns:
      This transaction instance.

    • buildAndSignTransaction

      public MessageTransaction<T> buildAndSignTransaction​(java.util.function.Function<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicMessageSubmitTransaction,​com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Transaction> builderFunction)
      Sets TopicMessageSubmitTransaction parameters, builds and signs it without executing it. Topic ID and transaction message content are already set in the incoming transaction.
      Parameters:
      builderFunction - The transaction builder function.
      Returns:
      This transaction instance.
